channel.title: Is it possible too
channel.description: i was wondering if its possible to take a rsps and change the characters to look like werewolves or somthing just not the normal characters and i dont mean like a pnpc command to make them look like the rs design ones i mean could you have somone spawn as a monster you designed with a program so instead of being people we could be my design of werewolves or somthing? or would i have to completely design a game from scratch?

item.title: Is it possible too

thanks ill look into this more now

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible too
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

mrpopyman:

yes but that takes ALLOT of coding knowledge, something probably only a gaming company like JaGeX could do.

“Coding” don’t really have THAT much, just change the character model loading to the say warewolf loading no I don’t know how to but thats how it would be done.

Read full topic
